By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can provide students with skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting students to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market by working out the optimal short- and long-term investment decisions.

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 日、職建都所與建築四合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解世界地域文化中，因人、因時、因地制宜的建築生產過程，及其涉入空間行為因時間積累而呈現的特殊環境型態、類型與結構；即在探討地方自然地理環境，如何經由人類行為的涉入，呈現出富鄉土涵構的人文景觀。
description.en: This course is to understand the relations between human, behavior, material and the environment of architecture in the world. And try to introduce the vernacular characters of the World architecture by the discussion of some special architectural themes.

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 日、職建都所與建築四合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2. 探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3. 進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4. 學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

notes: 日、職建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1. 概論 2. 文化遺產防災之重要性 3. 文化遺產防災之基本策略 4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式 5. 文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在強化有關都市土地使用規劃與成長管理的理論與經驗，以及增進對都市整體建成環境未來的瞭解。因此，本課程將藉由對都市土地使用規劃與成長管理經驗特有與一般課題、對策及創新作法的基礎瞭解，以培養理論與實務的知能。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、都市成長對土地的需求。 二、土地使用管制與倫理。三、都市變遷與規劃。四、都市成長管理與政府的角色。 五、達到都市成長管理的可能途徑。 六、都市成長管理體系內的必要措施：例如環境、交通運輸、住宅、財政、風險、信託、組織等。 七、結論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with urban land use planning and growth management, and the struggle to define the collective future of our built environment. By identifying unique as well as common issues, problems, and innovations in urban growth management experiences, our hope is to improve planning practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Land needs for urban growth. 2. Land use control and ethics. 3. Urban change and planning. 4.Growth management and the role of government. 5. Alternative approaches to growth management. 6. Balancing planning needs in growth management systems: environmental, transportation, housing, financing, risk, trust and organization concerns. 7. Conclusions

name.zh: 都市土地使用計畫與成長管理
name.en: Urban Land Use Planning and Growth Management

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學施工安全與災害方面之基礎，以為將來投身土木建築工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含：擋土開挖、基礎施工、假設工程、結構主體工程、裝修工程、山坡地等施工安全與災害防制等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover:  Safety and disaster preclusion of  opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering   etc.

notes: 日職合開 / 夜間上課

description.zh: 為使土木營建背景的學生具備跨域學習與創用能力，本課程扣合當前重要時趨 (如 SDGs, ESG, LCA, ESDG/USR 等) 於土木與防災之低碳管理。擇採綠色與數位雙軸科技 (如數位碳盤查與減碳之智化物聯網 AIoT) 作為課程雙核心編排，介紹內容如碳 - 水 - 環境足跡之盤查與減碳策略、綠 - 智 - 健康之數位雲平台、無線感測與低工耗遠域網路等專案開發的理與例，以符綠智營建之踐履，以臻永續經管之倡議。為求哲科合一，課程亦將思與學之認識與方法作簡扼介紹 (系統思考與問題導向學習)。
description.en: To achieve interdisciplinary learning and innovative creativity for civil engineering students, this course presents the Carbon-Water-Environmental inventory associated with Artificial Intelligent/Internet of Things (AIoT) to meet sustainable development of civil engineering and disaster adaptation/mitigation. The contents in this class include sustainable development goals such as SDGs, ESG, LCA, ESDG/USR briefly, green-intelligent-healthy construction/maintenance and resilient projects, WSN (Wireless Network), LPWAN (Low Power Wide-Area Network), e-Cloud Management.Meanwhile, Systems Thinking (ST) and Problem-based Learning (PBL) , which are crucial for philosophy of science, would be introduced for this holistic approach.

name.zh: 土木與防災之低碳管理
name.en: Low Carbon Management of Civil Engineering and Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 針對大學所習之廣義生產管理再作深入的闡述，一方面做公開的個案分析研討，以收進一步的學習之效，同時要求學生做實務專題研究
description.en: Production and operation management,case study and analysis,and independent study.

description.zh: 為增強 ESL/EFL 學生的整體的語文能力與跨文化溝通的軟實力，流傳各國的有名故事可採用來作為學生研讀、討論與從事再次創造的素材。這些故事包括人們鍾愛幾世紀的老故事，它們後來幾世代的版本，現代的改寫，與時尚的扭曲變種。依照不同主題被歸納成組 (例如：灰姑娘情結，哀怨邪惡的後母，攀龍附鳳的赤貧男子等等) 並以多媒體教學方法，藉由閱讀跨文化與跨世代的故事裡強化英語的教與學。
description.en: In both ESL and EFL classrooms, English serves not only as a means to conduct daily communication but also as a media to explore diversified subjects and fields. To build up students’ communicative competence, famous stories and popular tales prove to be resourceful because of their richness in linguistic, cultural, and psychological significance. In this course, multi-cultural stories (including archetypal tales, classic fairy tales, their modern counterparts, and their twisted revisions) are carefully selected and organized according to their main theme. For future teachers taking this course, the instructor will demonstrate how this approach can be actually practiced to best benefit ESL/EFL students. In the practicum section, future teachers are required to try their hands in using these stories.

name.zh: 文化故事與英語教學應用
name.en: Using Cultural Stories in ESL/EFL Classrooms

description.zh: 電腦模擬是解決現今工程問題不可或缺之工具，但常用的商業模擬軟體不但價格昂貴，其功能常不足以應付前瞻研究所需。本課程旨在培養學生設計專業領域之模擬程式與分析工具的能力，強化軟體開發工程實務的素養。課程訓練分兩階段進行：第一階段確認學生具備基本程式設計能力。首先使其熟悉 Linux 平台及開源軟體的使用，運行不須理論基礎的簡易粒子模擬，針對收集到的數據進行統計分析，資料視覺化，資料定量分析及洞察等任務。以任務導向的學習方式，刺激同學針對特定問題和需求而快速擬定演算法，系統性地解決問題。第二階段將模擬工具開發的能力應用在各科系的專業上。在進行短暫的文獻回顧後，與修課學生討論其專業領域中可用模擬解決或加速的學術研究及產業問題。針對主題制定計畫內容後，以選定的程式語言撰寫相關的應用程式，並以開發成開源軟體為最終目標。註一、課程函授上以 GNU Fortran 和 Python3 為主要程式語言選擇，但學生可自由選擇所熟悉的語言作為工具。註二、修課基本條件為修畢工程學院各系一年級程式設計相關之基礎課程，且具基本撰寫程式的能力。
description.en: This course aims to provide complete training for developing modeling and simulation tools in engineering applications. Students will obtain the ability to analyze problems, formulate algorithms, write code, and implement the developed open-source programs in their fields of study. The first part of the training focuses on task-oriented coding experiences. Students will get familiar with the Linux platform and open-source programs. They will perform simple, particle-based simulations. The collected data will be analyzed, visualized, and interpreted based on the programs written by students.The second part of the training applies the coding knowledge to students’ fields of study. After the literature survey, students will select the topic based on theirexpertise, where research or industrial problems can be accelerated by computer modeling. The final goal is to create software based on the course project.

name.en: Development of Simulation Tools  for Engineering

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1. 單晶的生長 2. 磊晶技術 3. 擴散與離子植入 4. 乾式及溫式蝕刻 5. 化學蒸氣沈積法 6. 金屬薄膜技術 7. 光電元件製程 8. 元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 數據無處不在。隨著真實世界和數位世界交互影響，越來越多的設計決策有望得到數據分析的支持。本課程旨在培養設計師的數據素養技能。首先介紹對個性化產品和服務的需求，是如何從認知及情感面來創造更好的使用者經驗，並將數據資訊轉換為產品知識 / 服務設計 / 系統決策。大部分課堂時間將以研究導向的設計專題方式進行。完成本課程後，您將能夠：1. 區分批量生產及個性化設計 2. 了解如何將數據科學納入設計流程 3. 描述由不同來源（例如人類、機器或環境）生成的數據特徵和形式 4. 應用合適的工具 / 軟體來解釋小型或大型數據集 5. 了解在設計過程中使用數據的倫理與關鍵原則
description.en: Data is everywhere. As the physical and digital worlds have become intertwined, more and more design decisions are expected to be supported by data analytics. Hence, this course aims to build your data literacy skills as a designer. The course will begin by introducing the need for personalized products and services to create a better user experience. This concerns not only the cognitive but also affective aspects. The insights obtained from the data can then be translated to determine product/service/system requirements. Students will spend the majority of the class time on research-oriented projects.Upon completing this course, you will be able to:1.Distinguish the difference between mass production and personalization 2.Gain a better understanding of how data science can be incorporated into the design process 3.Describe the characteristics and forms of data generated by different sources such as humans, machines, or environments 4.Apply suitable tools/software to interpre

notes: 工設三四與創新所合開；上限 7 人

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1. 介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2. 訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3. 熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 光華 409, 預選限 10 人，互動日碩 / 外碩 / 設計博合開

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學，多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析。設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程探討電子材料性質、固態物理基礎、元件物理等相關內容，強化電子材料與半導體元件技術之關聯性，藉由剖析材料結構與元件電性，深入探討電子元件在實際應用時可能遭遇之材料議題。本課程將介紹多種半導體元件技術應用，內容包括 p-n 接面、發光二極體與太陽能電池等。
description.en: This course will introduce the material properties, the basics of solid-state physics, and semiconductor devices and physics to provide knowledge of electronic materials and modern semiconductor devices. To assess the material and device issues of electronics for practical use, analysis of the material structure and electrical performance are essential. The content will include various semiconductor device technologies, such as p-n junction, light emitted diodes (LEDs), and solar cells.

name.zh: 電子材料與元件技術特論
name.en: Special Topics in Electronic Materials and Devices

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論 1.1 陶瓷產品 1.2 陶瓷製程特色 1.3 目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固。液 氣三相反應　2.1 三相反應 2.2 乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1 名詞定義 3.2 粉末規格 3.3 熱化與熱物分析 3.4 粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1 粉碎 4.2 混合 4.3 成團第五章 成形製程 5.1 乾壓法 5.2 注漿法 5.3 塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定 6.1 固液相界面 6.2 帶電界面 6.3 穩定態 6.4 流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統 7.1 水懸浮液 7.2 泥漿性質 7.3 牛頓型懸浮液 7.4 有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程 8.1 壓濾製程 8.2 離心製程 8.3 注漿製程 8.4 乳化及發泡製程 8. 5 其他
description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 有機光譜鑑定特論是鑑定有機分子結構的必備學問，也是研究有機分子行為常用之工具，本課程的主要目的是讓同學了解各種光譜學的基本原理，分析與其常見之應用，並透過實例之光譜分析與解題技巧，奠定同學相關研究的基礎.
description.en: Organic Spectroscopy Special Topics is an essential knowledge for identification of organic molecular structures. It is also a very useful tool for researches on the behavior of organic molecules. This course is aimed to introduce the basic principles and applications of the organic spectroscopy to students. The students will also practice in the class on analyzing the sample spectra so that they can apply these techniques to their research work.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋討論光電學之基本應用原理並結合分子生物學之知識 （諸如 脫氧核糖核酸核糖核酸 蛋白質 或細胞的基本結構介紹） 希望能更拓展學員對光電學應用的眼界本課程目標將藉由了解光電探測儀器之操作應用，光源控制，與光源種類之差異（諸如 gamma 射線，X - 射線，UV 光，紅外線與可見光), 進而將之應用於生物分子的觀察，與生命科學應用上，範圍之廣無可界限.
description.en: This course covers optoelectronics combine with biomolecular of knowledge. We will focus on discussing how the DNA, RNA, protein or cells related with optoelectronic application.Optoelectronics is the study and application of electronic devices that source, detect and control light, usually considered a subfield of photonics. The light often includes invisible forms of radiation such as gamma rays, X-rays, ultraviolet and infrared, in addition to visible light, which is based on the quantum mechanical effects of light on semiconducting materials. A biomolecule is any organic molecule that is produced by a living organism, including large polymeric molecules such as proteins, polysaccharides, and nucleic acids as well as small molecules such as primary metabolites, secondary metabolites, and natural products. As organic molecules, biomolecules consist primarily of carbon and hydrogen, nitrogen, and oxygen, and, to a smaller extent, phosphorus and sulfur.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 課程內容包括：原理探討：超音波，磁場與磁性，電磁感應與渦電流，輻射線，液體表面現象，材料微結構；方法介紹：磁場檢測法，超音波檢測法，渦電流檢測法，X 光檢測法，液滲法，微奈米檢測 (各種顯微鏡) 等；材料非破壞檢測實驗：導電性材料、磁性材料、陶瓷材料、複合材料之缺陷檢測；結構非破壞檢測實驗：機械零件、以及特定結構之檢測；非破壞檢測影像：電腦數據擷取、數據分析、與影像處理
description.en: Introduce the concepts of following topics, Fundamentals: ultrasonic waves, magnetic field and magnetism, electromagnetic induction and eddy currents, X-rays, penetrants. NDT methods: ultrasonic testing, magnetoscopic inspections, eddy current testing, radiographic technique, penetrants method. NDT of materials: conductive materials, magnetic materials, ceramics, composite materials. NDT of structures: mechanical components, specific structures. NDT images: PC-based data acquisition, data analysis and image process.

name.zh: 材料與結構非破壞檢測
name.en: Non-Destructive Testing of Materials and Structures

notes: 日職機電所、製科所和機電博 (含外) 合開，限日間 7 人 夜

description.zh: 1. 需求面管理與節約能源 2. 負載管理策略與成效評估 3. 負載監控與需量控制管理 4. 汽電共生及其他能源應用 5. 配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

description.zh: 1. 交流電機模型 2. 磁場導向控制 3. 電流型變頻器控制 4. 電壓型變頻器控制 5. 控制器參數調整 6. 交流電機轉速估測
description.en: 1. MODELLING OF AC DRIVES2. VECTOR CONTROL OF AC DRIVES3. CURRENT SOURCE INVERTER CONTROL4. VOLTAGE SOUR INVERTER CONTROL5. PARAMETER TUNING OF CONTROLLER6. SPEED ESTIMATION OF AC DRIVES

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。最後，透過對於 ESG 與市場機會、責任投資原則、環境足跡 (碳足跡、水足跡等) 盤點等，來訓練製作永續報告書的基礎能力
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.Finally, through ESG market opportunities, principles for responsible investment, inventory of environmental footprint (carbon footprint, water footprint, etc.), we expect to build up students the basic ability to generate the ESG report.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

notes: 工管所和 IMBA 合開

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink 簡介 2. 控制系統建模 3. 線性時變控制系統分析 4. 可觀測性與可控制性 5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析 6. 曲線擬合與系統建模 7. 控制器設計 8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 本課程集總電路種類與電路定理，對電路元件及其一階電路、二階電路、二極體電路、驅動電路、保護電路、交流電路進行分析與設計。
description.en: This course collects circuit topologies and circuit theorems. And to analyze and design circuit components and their first-order circuits, second-order circuits, diode circuits, drive circuits, protection circuits, and AC circuits.

name.en: Analysis and Design of Electronic Circuit

description.zh: 本課程專為研究生所設計，提供機器人全方位之分析與應用，課程主題如下所示：1.         空間描述與座標轉換 2.         機械手臂運動學 3.         機械手臂反向運動學 4.         賈氏矩陣：速度與靜力 5.         機械手臂動力學 6.         軌跡規劃 7.         機械手臂控制 8.         機器視覺 9.         工業自動化應用 10.      實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制註：大四生須經授課教師同意方可選修。
description.en: This course is designed for graduate students and will provide a solid analytical and practical experience on a variety of aspects in robotics. Topics in the course are as follows.1.         Spatial descriptions and transformations 2.         Manipulation kinematics3.         Inverse manipulator kinematics4.         Jacobians: velocities and static forces5.         Manipulator dynamics6.         Trajectory generation7.         Control of manipulators8.         Machine vision9.         Industrial automation applications10.      Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robotsSenior undergraduate students are allowed to take this course in case they are approved by the instructor.

name.zh: 高等機器人與自動化應用

notes: 電機所、自動化所、機械自動化外生和創新 AI. 電資 AI 合

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的在於教授都市設計的基本分析理論與方法，除透過課堂案例的介紹與討論外，學生還將以分組方式進行觀察研究與運算分析。案例介紹與討論之重點在於認識影響都市空間環境品質的關鍵要素，而分組研究之目的則在於讓學生藉由各種現場觀察與數位分析工具的應用，進一步探索這些關鍵要素在都市空間形構過程的交互影響過程。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to key theoretical and methodological approaches in urban design. The main content will be delivered through a series of case study discussion and project-based research practice. In specific, the case study is to review and identify key factors shaping the physical environment of cities; while through collaborative research projects, students are expected to engage in a step-by-step process of on-site observation and computational analysis, examining how the factors are interacting with each other.

description.zh: 當 Lumiere 兄弟於 1895 年末在巴黎一家咖啡館，舉辦第一場售票的電影放映會時，也正是全球第二次工業革命如火如荼影響人們的生產方式與都市生活之際，透過紀錄當代都市活動與工業化機械美學的短片，他們讓電影技術與城市發展從最初就密不可分，共同作為歌頌現代性的重要媒介。然而，學術界要遲到約莫百年之後，從 1990 年代開始才逐漸形成專門探討電影與城市互動關係的跨學門領域。來自電影研究、都市研究、地理學、歷史學、比較文學、區域研究？？等等領域的學者們，於過去三十數年間替電影城市研究貢獻心力。他們不只是藉由電影分析與相關史料爬梳來重新理解現代性、現代主義與當代都市的發展，也同時關注於二次大戰後流行的黑色電影 (film noir) 如何將當時的都市議題作為其創作主題，後續於 1970 年代起流行的各種近未來反烏托邦電影，又是怎麼進一步藉由預測人類都市的發展來反思當下，創造電影與城市間更為複雜的互文關係。千禧年之後，隨著電影工業與市場的全球化，電影逐漸成為具有都市行銷潛力的大眾媒體，電影場景更逐步發展成一個重要的觀光類型。同時因為電影技術門檻降低與社群媒體的發展，電影也不再只是電影公司或具有天份的獨立電影工作者的遊戲，更多難以分類的影像對都市空間進
description.en: While cinema has been invented over a hundred years and getting influential in shaping people’s perspectives to our environments, the studies of cinematic urbanism have only initiated since 1990s. During the past decades, this interdisciplinary field has developed upon the scholarships of various disciplines, including film and media studies, cultural studies, history, geography, urban studies, etc. This course intends to introduce this still young field through chronologically examining the relationships between cinema and cities, from both being used to celebrate and mediate the modern feelings,to film noir playing a crucial role to criticize and depict urban problems, and to cinematic urban imaginaries boosting tourism and intervening in urban process. Students will learn the theories and methodologies of cinematic urbanism studies, comprehending cinema and different urban spaces as powerful medium that could be manipulated to create, transmit, and perceive certain ideologies.

description.zh: 本課程從建築物構築方法和材料特性出發，介紹構法的歷史以及創新應用。內容包括現行工法的運用，以及先進工法的突破。藉由課程引導和案例介紹，培養學生構法知識與應用能力，提升學理與實務上的知能。
description.en: This course starts from building construction methods, introduces the technical history, innovative applications of construction methods. The content includes the application of current construction methods, as well as the breakthrough of advanced construction. Through course guidance and case study, students will cultivate their knowledge of construction method, and enhance their ability in academic theory and practice.

name.zh: 傳統與未來的建築構法

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2. 探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3. 進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4. 學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

notes: 日、職建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2. 探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3. 探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4. 學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

description.zh: 課程包含以下主題 1. 交流馬達簡介 2. 交流馬達機電能量轉換基礎 3. 磁性材料 4. 交流馬達繞線 5. 交流馬達設計原理 6. 交流馬達之有限元素分析 7. 交流馬達之機械設計
description.en: The contents of this course include:1. Introduction of AC motors2. Energy conversion and AC electric machine basics 3. Magnetic materials 4. AC electric machine winding 5. Design principles of AC electric machines6. Finite element analysis of AC electric machines 7. Mechanical design of AC electric machines

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程，其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 本門科目主要為介紹隨機震動學基本理論、頻譜分析與小波分析理論。主要的授課內容涵蓋基本統計理論、隨機訊號定義、期望值與相關函數、傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉、功率頻譜密度函數、頻譜分析、非定常訊號判斷、基礎小波分析等。配合結構動力學，本科目亦講授結構系統受到隨機外力作用而產生之結構反應的頻率域動力分析應用及小波分析應用等範例。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the basics of random vibration, spectral and wavelet analysis. The schedule includes those topics such as fundamental theories of statistics, definition of random signals, expectation and correlation functions, Fourier transform and F.F.T., power spectral density, spectral analysis, non-stationarity judgement, and basic theories of wavelet analysis. To harmony with Dynamics of Structures, this course also introduces examples of dynamic analysis of structural systems excited by random loadings in the frequency domain and applications of wavelet analysis.

name.zh: 隨機震動學與時頻分析
name.en: Introduction to Random Vibration and Time-Frequency-Domain Analysis

description.zh: 設計方法，材料性質，構件受壓行為，構件受拉行為，構件受撓行為，軸力和彎矩之聯合作用，構件受剪行為，構件受扭行為。
description.en: Behavior of Reinforced Concrete Frame   1.Method of Design2.Properties of Materials3.Compressed Behavior of Frame4.Tension Behavior of Frame5.Flexing Behavior of Frame6.Impact of Axial Force And Moment7.Shear Behavior of Frame8.Torsion Behavior of Frame

name.zh: 鋼筋混凝土構件行為學

description.zh: 1. 台灣海域的地質概述，2. 海域的工程地質調查，3. 不同環境下的風場結構，4. 海流特性的調查與評估，5. 波浪特性的調查與評估，6. 鋼結構施工，7. 風機之運輸與安裝，8. 灌漿工程，9. 離岸變電站與基礎，10. 風機葉片之製作、安裝、維護與維修 11. 海纜鋪設工程 12. 構材防蝕技術 13. 沖刷防治 14 基樁鑽掘與噪音降檢
description.en: 1. Offshore geology description nearby Taiwan, 2. Offshore geotechnical site investigation, 3. Wind farm structures under different environmental conditions, 4. Investigation and evaluation of current properties, 5. Investigation and evaluation of wave properties, 6. Construction of steel structure, 7. Transportation and installation of wind turbines, 8. Grouting engineering, 9. Offshore substation and foundation , 10. Fabrication, installation, maintenance and repair of wind turbine blades, 11. Laying procedures of subsea power cables, 12. Corrosion-proof technologies, 13. Scouring-proof technologies, 14 Pile drilling and noise reduction

name.zh: 離岸風機工程調查與施工
name.en: Engineering investigation and construction for offshore wind turbines

notes: 顧寶鼎老師 / 工程學院與防災所合開 / 研究所限 30 人 / 先鋒

description.zh: 數位影像科技的硬體快速進步與影像分析演算法普及化，使得電腦視覺與影像量測技術在工程量測、安全監測，與自動辨識具有相當高的潛力。電腦視覺與影像量測結合影像分析、空間原理、測量原理、誤差分析、機器學習，與工程應用等不同領域，是一個多領域整合的應用科目。本課程訓練學生在電腦視覺與影像量測的基本理論與案例實作的能力。在理論方面，本課程介紹影像原理、空間量測原理、誤差原理、機器學習，以及國內外的發展現況。在實作方面，本課程利用小型結構實驗室，讓同學自行設定小型結構實驗與量測方法，或進而改良或開發分析程式。配合實驗實作與期末專案研究，本課程培養理論認知、資訊技術、實驗實作能力、外語閱讀能力，與簡報與報告編寫熟練度。
description.en: The rapid development and population of digital imaging hardware and algorithms bring high potential of computer vision and image measurement on practical applications. These applications can include but not limited to measurement, structural health monitoring, and safety identification. This course not only introduces the theory of computer vision and image measurement, but also guides students to operate and implement structural experiments and measurement projects. Students are encouraged to bring up the concepts and theories, programming skills, experimental design and implementation, oral presentations, as well as experimental documentation and technical writing ability.

description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analyses, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most compiterized models for engineering,the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All the uncertainty may contribute to the stochsticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which, in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore,proper assessment of model outout uncertainty is essential.

description.zh: 為使土木營建背景的學生具備跨域學習與創用能力，本課程扣合當前重要時趨 (如 SDGs, ESG, LCA, USR 等) 於民生基礎建設之因應；擇採相關物聯網數位科技作為課程編排，介紹內容如無線感測、低工耗遠域網路邊緣運算、雲端管理、數位平台、綠能蓄電、人工智能、低 / 無代碼等專案開發的理與例，以符綠智營建之踐履，以臻永續經管之倡議。為求哲科合一，課程亦將思與學之認識與方法作簡扼介紹 (系統思考與問題導向學習)。
description.en: To achieve interdisciplinary learning and Innovative creativity for civil engineering students, this course presents the Internet of Things (IoT) to social infrastructure development including green-intelligent construction/maintenance and resilient adaptation briefly. To aim at the initiate of sustainable development goals (such as SDGs, ESG, LCA, USR) applied to civil engineering, some vital issues in this course would be focused as follows,WSN (Wireless Network), LPWAN (Low Power Wide-Area Network),Edge Computing, e-Cloud Management, Digitized Platform (PaaS/IaaS/SaaS), Green Energy and Cell, Artificial Intelligences, Low- & No-code techniques, etc.Meanwhile, Systems Thinking (ST) and Problem-based Learning (PBL) , which are crucial for philosophy of science, would be introduced for this holistic approach.

name.zh: 民生建設物聯網於綠智與韌性營建
name.en: Infrastructure IoT to Green-Intelligent and Resilient Construction

notes: 土木三四甲乙和防災所合開 / 研究所上限 12 人 / 土木 205

description.zh: 土壤沖蝕與保育課程將深入探討土壤侵蝕的種類、原因、影響和防治方法。學生將了解各種類型的土壤侵蝕、導致其發生的因素以及可採用的保護策略，本課程將特別針對水蝕，探討降雨分佈、土壤性質、地形因素及地表植被覆蓋的重要性，以及介紹為促進土壤保育而制定的政策和計畫。經由此課程，學生將了解土壤沖蝕與保育的原理，並將具備在各類環境中制定和實施有效保護策略的知識和技能。此外，本課程將作為本校實現大學社會責任價值的一門課。
description.en: The Soil Erosion and Conservation course delves into the types, causes, impacts, and prevention methods of soil erosion. Students will learn about various types of soil erosion, the factors that lead to their occurrence, and the protective strategies that can be adopted. The course specifically focuses on water erosion, exploring the importance of rainfall distribution, soil properties, topographic factors, and surface vegetation cover. Additionally, policies and programs designed to promote soil conservation will be introduced. Through this course, students will gain an understanding of the principles of soil erosion and conservation. They will possess the knowledge and skills necessary to develop and implement effective protective strategies in various environments. Furthermore, this course will serve as a course for our university to realize the core value of university social responsibility (USR).

notes: 土木四甲乙合開與防災所合開 / 研究所上限 15 人

description.zh: 工程進度規劃與控制是營建工程進行專案管理時之重要知識與技術，此課程包含 ADM 及 PDM 網圖、要徑分析、PERT 分析、趕工計畫、及實獲值分析等理論知識，同時也會結合工程進度控管軟體應用技術。本課程目標意在培養同學具備工程進度規劃與控制觀念知識，並透過專案練習及軟體操作讓同學具備工程進度規劃與控制能力。
description.en: Construction project scheduling and control is necessary and important for effective management of construction projects. The course introduces the major concepts and methods for construction project schedule scheduling and control. The course includes plan and analysis of ADM and PDM networks, analysis of critical paths,, plan for catch-up, introduction of PERT and earned value analysis methods. The course will teach students the major concept and methods of construction project scheduling and control. Furthermore, the course will enhance students abilities and techniques integrated with project practices and project schedule software uses.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測 (溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測 (水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線) 及地下水 (土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

notes: 上課地點材資館 502-2 室

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 導論、積體電路生產介紹、半導體基礎、晶圓製造、加熱製程、微影蝕刻、電漿的基礎原理、離子佈植、化學氣相沉積與介電質薄膜、金屬化製程、化學機械研磨、製程整合、CMOS 製程
description.en: Introduction、Introduction to IC Fabrication、Semiconductor Basics、   Wafer Manufacturing、Thermal Processes、Photolithography and Etch、Plasma Basics、Ion Implantation、CVD and Dielectric Thin Film、  Metallization、CMP 、Process Integration、CMOS Processes

notes: 光電所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 生物科技產業已是二十一世紀世界各國的重要產業，我國亦視生技產業為繼電子產業後的新興產業，然而生物科技產業與其他科技產業的差異，在於用於人體或具醫療用途的生技產品，除了品質管理外，更須考慮安全與效能，我國與世界各國對於生技產品大都以建置相當程度的法規環境，以有效的管理生技產品並確保人之安全。因此，對於生技產品特有的管理制度以及安全與效能等特殊需求若無正確的認識，將非常不利產業發展。本課程將以疫苗、血液製劑、基因工程製劑、診斷試劑、人體細胞組織產品等目前已研發成熟與正發展中的生技產品為例，從產品設計、品質與製程管制、效能與安全評估、法規環境與管理制度到我國管理方式，以深入淺出的方式做完整的介紹，此外，課程中也將針對生技產業面臨的生物安全問題及其需要的設施、生技產業的挑戰與機會等議題，進行充分的講述與討論。透過此課程，期望學生建立在生技產品品質管理、製程管制、安全評估及產品登記等方面的基本概念，以培養生技產業目前極度缺乏的製程規劃人材。
description.en: In the 21th century, the bio-technological industry has been the important industry in the world.  It is also the most emergent sunrise industry following the electronics industry in Taiwan.  The bio-technological industry is very different from the other technological industries.  The biological products intended for human therapeutic use have to face the needs of safety and efficacy except product quality.  Taiwan government and other countries have established the regulatory framework for biological products to ensure their safety and efficacy.  Therefore, the realization of the management system for biological products is very useful to industry development.This course uses the examples of vaccines, blood products,  recombinant DNA products, diagnostic devices and human cell and tissue-based products to introduce the design control, quality control, process control, evaluation for safety and efficacy and regulatory framework in Taiwan.  The course also discusses the issues of fac

name.zh: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
name.en: The Introduction to Quality,Safety and Regulation of Biology

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學施工安全與災害方面之基礎，以為將來投身土木建築工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含：擋土開挖、基礎施工、假設工程、結構主體工程、裝修工程、山坡地等施工安全與災害防制等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover:  Safety and disaster preclusion of  opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering   etc.

notes: 日職合開 / 夜間上課

description.zh: 本課程介紹現有無線區域網路規格的多工存取層及實體層，並深入解說規格中所使用通訊技術的原理，如載波偵測多工－避免碰撞通訊協定，正交分頻多工調變技術。
description.en: This course contains the medium access control layer(MAC) and physical layer(PHY) of the mose recent IEEE 802.11 standards for wireless local area networks. Thechniques employed by the standards, e.g.,craier sense multiple access/collision avoidance (CSMA/CA),orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDA), will be discussed in details.

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 在過去的 60 年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路，進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力，課程內容包念： 1. 電源管理 IC 設計簡介 2. 電壓參考電路設計 3. 低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4. 交換式電壓調整器 5. 交換電容電源轉換器 6. 電池充電技術與應用 7. 設計專題討論

Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

description.zh: 設計科學研究重視創造與解決現實世界問題相關且實用的成品或服務。目標是開發具有實用價值並可在實務中實施的解決方案或進一步進行設計驗證。課堂進行方式，除了方法講解，將於課堂採用方法卡與結構化的課堂互動模式，深化學生對設計學在學術研究方法的認識與應用。學生將學會：1. 理解設計學的範疇與趨勢 2. 理解如何擬定研究命題與設計研究方法 3. 理解量化與質性研究方法 4. 理解研究結果的詮釋與視覺化 5. 擬定研究命題、研究框架、研究流程與方法
description.en: Design science research values the creation of finished products or service that are relevant and useful in solving real-world problems. The goal is to develop solutions that have practical value and can be implemented in practice or for further design verification. In addition to method explanations, method cards and a structured classroom interaction mode will be used in class to deepen students' understanding and application of design methods in academic research. Students will learn:1.Understand the scope and trends of design2.Understand how to formulate research propositions and design research methods3.Understand quantitative and qualitative research methods4.Understand the interpretation and visualization of research results5.Formulate research propositions, research framework, research processes and methods

name.zh: 設計學研究方法與實踐策略
name.en: Design Science Research Methods & Practical Strategies

description.zh: 結晶學已經是成為當今科學研究領域的一門重要知識與技術。至目前為止至少有 20 位諾貝爾獎得主其貢獻都與結晶學有關。在這課程，我們將闡述結晶學的相關基本知識，例如：晶格、對稱、原子散射、結構因子及解結構。此外，這門課程也將涵蓋實際操作解結構。所有基礎知識與實作，涵蓋單晶繞射與粉末繞射。也將涵蓋部分蛋白質結晶學的基本知識。
description.en: Crystallography has become an important field in scientific knowledge and technique in physics, chemistry, materials, and biology, which has been recognized by more than 20 winners of Nobel prize. In this course, we will illustrate the fundamental knowledge about crystal lattice, symmetry, atomic scattering, structure factor, and structure determination. In addition, the course also includes practices in structure determination by single crystal x-ray diffraction and powder x-ray diffraction. All fundamental knowledge and practices are mainly in small molecular cases, but part of knowledge of protein crystallography will also be included.

notes: 限制 7 人分子四和高分所合開

description.zh: 設計科學研究重視創造與解決現實世界問題相關且實用的成品或服務。目標是開發具有實用價值並可在實務中實施的解決方案或進一步進行設計驗證。課堂進行方式，除了方法講解，將於課堂採用方法卡與結構化的課堂互動模式，深化學生對設計學在學術研究方法的認識與應用。學生將學會：1. 理解設計學的範疇與趨勢 2. 理解如何擬定研究命題與設計研究方法 3. 理解量化與質性研究方法 4. 理解研究結果的詮釋與視覺化 5. 擬定研究命題、研究框架、研究流程與方法

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括：(1) 黏彈性簡介 (2) 時間溫度轉換 (3) 非結晶區之玻璃轉移點 (4) 橡膠理論 (5) 黏彈模型 (6) 介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念 2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式 3. 形狀函數及等參數元素 4. 一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等 5. 二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題：一般實體 7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理 8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用 9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems
